Methods in com.sencha.gxt.cell.core.client that return Style.AnchorAlignment

Methods in com.sencha.gxt.cell.core.client with parameters of type Style.AnchorAlignment
 void ButtonCell.setMenuAlign(Style.AnchorAlignment menuAlign)
          Sets the position to align the menu to, see XElement.alignTo(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element, com.sencha.gxt.core.client.Style.AnchorAlignment, int[]) for more details (defaults to 'tl-bl?', pre-render).
